prompt:
Nurse: I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you.

Nurse: I'm sorry to hear about your abdominal pain, Mr. Dang. I'm going to trigger a RED kickout for your abdominal_pain. A nurse will be on the line shortly to assist you further. Please stay on the line. [

Patient: [NO RESPONSE] Are we going to continue with the call?

Nurse: Give me a moment to check how I can best support you. Give me a moment while I figure out how I can best help you.

Nurse: Yes, Mr. Dang, we will continue with the call. I'm here to ensure you have everything you need for your upcoming colonoscopy. Is it okay if we go over a few topics on prep for your colonoscopy?

Patient: Yes.

Nurse: Okay, thank you, Mr. Dang. Let's first get all the logistics out of the way. Your colonoscopy procedure is scheduled for August 17 at 10:00 AM with Doctor Meredith Bailey. You'll need to arrive about 1 hour before at 9:00 AM. Is that okay with you?

Patient: Yeah. I know.

responses.gpt4: Thank you for confirming that, Mr. Dang. Once you get to O'Connor hospital, your check-in location will be on the 1st Floor. Is that clear?
responses.our_model: I appreciate you letting me know. I'm going to take a moment to figure out the best way I can support you.
